SCTX - Script Source:
; Universal Cast When Used OnTarget - Item Script
;	** Please see mwCWUItemScript for description of how CWU works. **
;	This script is attached to clothing or armor piece that has a Targeted
;	Cast-When-Used enchantment. In order to prevent a targeted CWU enchantment
;	from errantly casting a potentially hostile spell whenever the item is
;	equipped, the item's unequipped state contains a placeholder enchantment
;	containing no magic effect.  This is dynamically replaced with the real
;	targeted CWU enchantment when the item is equipped.  When the item is
;	unequipped, the placeholder enchantment is put back on the item.
;
;	This script relies on the CWUTargetQuestScript to provide a	paired list 
;	of targetted CWU items BaseIDs and their true enchantments.
;
scn mwCWUTargetItemScript

short uses
short baseuses

ref me
ref myEnch
ref myWeap
ref myActor
ref mySpell
long dur

short ChargeMax
short ChargeCurrent
short ChargeCost

short index
long item_search

ref tempRef
ref menuSelection

ref currentActiveSpell
ref proxySpell

begin OnDrop Player
	if (myActor == Player)
		if (proxySpell != 0)
			player.RemoveSpellNS proxySpell
		endif
	endif

	Let index := ar_Find myWeap mwCWUInit.Inventory
	ar_Erase mwCWUInit.Inventory index
end

begin OnUnEquip

	; reset item's enchantment to placeholder (workaround for instant-cast on equip bug)
	if (myEnch != mwCWUTargetEn) && (IsWeapon me == 0)
		set myEnch to mwCWUTargetEn
		SetEnchantment myEnch
	endif

end

begin OnEquip

	set me to GetBaseObject

	let item_search := ar_Find me mwCWUTargetQuest.itemList
	if (item_search == -99999)
		PrintC "morroblivion-fixes ERROR: mwCWUTargetItemScript (line 68): %n(%i) was not found in the internal search list.", me, me
		return
	else
		let myEnch := mwCWUTargetQuest.itemEnchantmentMap[item_search]
		if (IsWeapon me)
			; if weapon, then keep placeholder enchantment -- otherwise will break engine
			SetEnchantment mwCWUDummyWeaponEnch
		else
			; only replace placeholder enchantment if item is a non-weapon
			SetEnchantment myEnch
		endif
	endif

	set myActor to GetContainer
	myActor.Dispel myEnch
	if mySpell == 0
		Let mySpell := Call mwCWUSpellCreationFunc myEnch
	endif
	if myActor != Player
		myActor.AddSpell mySpell
	endif
	PrintC "morroblivion-fixes: CWUTargetItemScript (87): %n(%i) has equipped %n(%i).", myActor, myActor, me, me

end

begin OnEquip Player

	if (myEnch == 0)
		printc "Morroblivion-fixes ERROR: mwCWUTargetItemScript (line 90): myEnch == 0 ( %i )", myEnch
		return
	endif

	set ChargeMax to GetEnchantmentCharge myEnch
	set ChargeCost to GetEnchantmentCost myEnch
	
	if myWeap == 0
		Let myWeap := Call mwCWUSetupWeaponTokenFunc me ChargeMax
	endif

	if myWeap != 0
		Let ChargeCurrent := Call mwCWUGetCurrentChargeFunc myWeap
	endif

	if ChargeCost > 0
		set baseuses to ChargeMax / ChargeCost
		set uses to ChargeCurrent / ChargeCost
	endif

	Let index := ar_Find myWeap mwCWUInit.Inventory
	if index == -99999
		ar_Append mwCWUInit.Inventory myWeap
	endif

; This is the original code which selected the enchantment spell as soon as the item was equipped.
; The new method is to require selection of the enchantment through the magic menu.  This avoids
; the need to un-equip/re-equip items to reselect an enchantment.
; ------------------ Select Enchantment On Equip -------------------------
	if (mwFixes.StrictMWEnchantmentSelection == 0)
		RemoveEventHandler "OnSpellCast" mwCWUCastEventHandler
		SelectPlayerSpell mySpell
		if (IsBipedIconPathValid 0 me)
			set mwCWU.IconString to GetBipedIconPath 0 me
		elseif (IsIconPathValid me)
			set mwCWU.IconString to GetIconPath me
		else
			set mwCWU.IconString to GetIconPath myEnch
		endif
		SetMenuStringValue "hudmain_background\hudmain_Magic_Icon\filename|Menus\Icons\%z" mwCWU.IconString 1004
		sv_Destruct mwCWU.IconString
		;===Setting Variables needed for Quest part
		set mwCWU.Ench to GetEnchantment
;		set mwCWU.Ench to myEnch
		set mwCWU.ItemSpell to mySpell
		set mwCWU.Item to GetBaseObject
		set mwCWU.Itemuses to uses
		set mwCWU.Itemusesmax to baseuses
		set mwCWU.ItemWeap to myWeap
		set mwCWU.ItemChargeMax to ChargeMax
		set mwCWU.ItemChargeCurrent to ChargeCurrent
		set mwCWU.ItemChargeCost to ChargeCost
		set mwCWU.onplayer to 1
	endif

	if (proxySpell == 0)
		set tempRef to mwCWUProxySpell
		set proxySpell to CloneForm tempRef
		SetNameEx "+%n", me, proxySpell
	endif

	player.AddSpellNS proxySpell	
			
end

begin MenuMode
	if me == 0
		set me to GetBaseObject
	endif

	; Detect proxyScroll activation
	if (mySpell != 0)
		set currentActiveSpell to GetPlayerSpell
		if (currentActiveSpell == proxySpell) 			
			; equip enchanted item if not already equipped
			if (player.GetEquipped me == 0)			
				; sanity check to make sure that the true enchantment is removed before equipping (workaround for cast-on-equip bug)
				if (myEnch != mwCWUTargetEn) && (IsWeapon me == 0)
					set myEnch to mwCWUTargetEn
					SetEnchantment myEnch
				endif
				Player.EquipItemNS me
			endif

			RemoveEventHandler "OnSpellCast" mwCWUCastEventHandler
			SelectPlayerSpell mySpell
			; set the active spell icon
;			set mwCWU.IconString to GetBipedIconPath 0 me
			if (IsBipedIconPathValid 0 me)
				set mwCWU.IconString to GetBipedIconPath 0 me
			elseif (IsIconPathValid me)
				set mwCWU.IconString to GetIconPath me
			else
				set mwCWU.IconString to GetIconPath myEnch
			endif
			SetMenuStringValue "hudmain_background\hudmain_Magic_Icon\filename|Menus\Icons\%z" mwCWU.IconString 1004
			sv_Destruct mwCWU.IconString
				;===Setting Variables needed for Quest part
			set mwCWU.Ench to GetEnchantment
;			set mwCWU.Ench to myEnch
			set mwCWU.ItemSpell to mySpell
			set mwCWU.Item to GetBaseObject
			set mwCWU.Itemuses to uses
			set mwCWU.Itemusesmax to baseuses
			set mwCWU.ItemWeap to myWeap
			set mwCWU.ItemChargeMax to ChargeMax
			set mwCWU.ItemChargeCurrent to ChargeCurrent
			set mwCWU.ItemChargeCost to ChargeCost
			set mwCWU.onplayer to 1
		endif
	endif
	
	if MenuMode 1002 || MenuMode 1008

		set menuSelection to GetActiveMenuSelection

; ------------- MouseOver Enchantment "tooltip" info ----------		
		if (menuSelection == me)
			if (myEnch == 0)
				set myEnch to GetEnchantment
			endif

			set dur to GetNthEffectItemDuration myEnch 0

			if myWeap != 0
				Let ChargeCurrent := Call mwCWUGetCurrentChargeFunc myWeap
			endif

			if ChargeCost > 0
				set uses to ChargeCurrent / ChargeCost
			endif

			SetMenuStringValue "magicpop_fake_background\magicpop_background\magicpop_background_bottom\string|Charge: %.0f/%.0f Uses: %.0f/%.0f%{%rDuration: %.0f s.%}" ChargeCurrent ChargeMax uses baseuses dur dur 1024
			SetMenuStringValue "magicpop_background\magicpop_background_bottom\string|Charge: %.0f/%.0f Uses: %.0f/%.0f%{%rDuration: %.0f s.%}" ChargeCurrent ChargeMax uses baseuses dur dur 1024
		endif

	endif
end

begin GameMode

	if (me == 0) || (myEnch == 0) || (myActor == 0)
		return
	endif

	; Make sure enchantment is removed if item is not equipped
	if (myActor == player) 

		; detect any programmatic unequipping that left real enchantment active
		if (player.GetEquipped me == 0)
			if (myEnch != mwCWUTargetEn) && (IsWeapon me == 0)
				PrintC "CWUTargetItemScript debug (line 223): %n(%i) no longer equipped, removing enchantment", me, me
				set myEnch to mwCWUTargetEn
				SetEnchantment myEnch
			endif
		endif

		; Detect proxySpell activation
		if (mySpell != 0)
			set currentActiveSpell to GetPlayerSpell
			if (currentActiveSpell == proxySpell) 
;				printc "CWUTargetItemScript (line 234): ActiveSpell=[%n](%i) , mySpell=[%n](%i)", currentActiveSpell, currentActiveSpell, mySpell, mySpell
				; equip enchanted item if not already equipped
				if (player.GetEquipped me == 0)			
					; sanity check to make sure that the true enchantment is removed before equipping (workaround for cast-on-equip bug)
					if (myEnch != mwCWUTargetEn) && (IsWeapon me == 0)
						set myEnch to mwCWUTargetEn
						SetEnchantment myEnch
					endif
					Player.EquipItemNS me
				endif

				RemoveEventHandler "OnSpellCast" mwCWUCastEventHandler
				SelectPlayerSpell mySpell
				;===Setting Variables needed for Quest part
				set mwCWU.Ench to GetEnchantment
;				set mwCWU.Ench to myEnch
				set mwCWU.ItemSpell to mySpell
				set mwCWU.Item to GetBaseObject
				set mwCWU.Itemuses to uses
				set mwCWU.Itemusesmax to baseuses
				set mwCWU.ItemWeap to myWeap
				set mwCWU.ItemChargeMax to ChargeMax
				set mwCWU.ItemChargeCurrent to ChargeCurrent
				set mwCWU.ItemChargeCost to ChargeCost
				set mwCWU.onplayer to 1				
				return
			endif
		endif
			
	endif

	if myActor.IsSpellTarget myEnch
		myActor.Dispel myEnch
	endif

	; if me == currently active enchant item, then update local data with active enchant item values
	if me == mwCWU.Item && mySpell == mwCWU.ItemSpell
;		printc "CWU OnTarget: %n(%i) - enchantment active", me, me
		set ChargeCurrent to mwCWU.ItemChargeCurrent
		if ChargeCost > 0
			set uses to ChargeCurrent / ChargeCost
		endif
		set mwCWU.Itemuses to uses

	endif

end
